content: let s knit a bushel of fall fruits this fun free pattern offers two gourd-geous shape variations knit the apple with horizontal stitches or try the vertical pumpkin pattern perfect for showcasing self-striping yarn that ll have your project looking like the pick of the patch once the knitting is complete stick a small branch or cinnamon stick into the center for a fabulous finish worked in luv & lee by zitron there should be enough yarn in each 50g ball to make two pieces embrace the fall vibes and add a touch of coziness to your home with a collection of these high-fiber fruits **this project is worked flat using the following techniques ** long tail cast on knit/purl simple finishing want the yarn to make these fall fruits we used luv & lee a wonderful 100% merino single ply yarn that also happens to be on clearance get it here 1 1 https //www makersmercantile com/shop/c/p/luv-lee-by-zitron-x25228555 htm
